name: BabySnores
0:
”Alexa open Baby Snores”
”Alexa ask Baby Snores to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: baby snores
des:
Baby Snores is designed to bring the tender and nostalgic moments of early parenthood into your home. This unique skill plays a series of soothing baby snoring sounds, meticulously recorded to capture the essence of those peaceful moments when your little one is fast asleep. Whether you're missing those early baby days, trying to relax, or even need a gentle sound to help your current baby feel less alone, Baby Snores offers a comforting auditory experience.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Baby Snores
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
